data.eml:eml: Two new species of Quichuana Knab (Diptera: Syrphidae) from the paramo ecosystems in Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Montoya, Augusto L., Ricarte, Antonio, Wolff, Marta (2017): Two new species of Quichuana Knab (Diptera: Syrphidae) from the paramo ecosystems in Colombia. Zootaxa 4244 (3): 390-402, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4244.3.7
